TEXT.S: Jordan Itini i 31 00 N, 36 00 E, noAsiya ko Jordan. Polong no sekalay i 89,342 sq km "saka 112 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 88,802 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 540 sq km " Polong i 8,185,384 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 11.40 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 1.10 , malo no roma to a sera 87.50 . siyoto O [[[Amman]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakalima 25 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Abdullah II of Jordan, patirengan a romi'ad i 1999 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 7 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
